name: ubl-runner
description: UBL Runner - Pull-only job executor with Ed25519 signatures

scripts.test:crypto: npx tsx -e "import { signReceipt, blake3Hex, canonicalize, verifySignature, getRunnerPublicKeyHex } from './crypto.js'; const payload = { command_id: 'test', permit_jti: 'jti', binding_hash: 'hash', runner_id: 'LAB_512', status: 'OK', logs_hash: 'logs', ret: {} }; const signed = signReceipt(payload); console.log('Signed:', signed); const canonical = canonicalize(payload); console.log('Verify:', verifySignature(canonical, signed.sig_runner, getRunnerPublicKeyHex()));"
